snippet.title: Christine - Teaser - Steam
snippet.description:
Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?
This interactive story will offer, throughout the story, a variety of different mechanics for experiencing Christine's actions and feelings, during her daily life and her relationships with friends and colleagues.

Add it to your wishlist and follow the game on Steam for updates.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1691500/Christine/

In development by Mens Sana Interactive
Art by Katia Numakura
Music by Tatyana Jacques

Follow our developer’s page on Steam to discover our other games.
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/menssana
